topo.config package

Submodules

topo.config.config module

class topo.config.config.TopoConfig(grid_spacing=2.0, input_units='in', output_units='ft', fill_method='iterative', fill_max_iterations=100, fill_tolerance=0.001, fill_neighbor_mode='8', apply_transform=True, invert_values=False, rounding=None, contour_spacing=12.0, contour_cmap='RdYlGn_r', smooth_contours=False, smooth_factor=0.5, figure_size=(6, 5), dpi=100, show_plot=True, save_path=None, x_label='Width', y_label='Height', title='Topographic Map')[source]

Bases: object

Holds configurable parameters for the entire topography workflow. Adjust defaults as needed, or pass values via constructor.

__init__(grid_spacing=2.0, input_units='in', output_units='ft', fill_method='iterative', fill_max_iterations=100, fill_tolerance=0.001, fill_neighbor_mode='8', apply_transform=True, invert_values=False, rounding=None, contour_spacing=12.0, contour_cmap='RdYlGn_r', smooth_contours=False, smooth_factor=0.5, figure_size=(6, 5), dpi=100, show_plot=True, save_path=None, x_label='Width', y_label='Height', title='Topographic Map')[source]
